name: Multiverse Rumble 2
description:
Multiverse Rumble was a beloved game by all, but all downloads have stopped. So I decided to create a sequel for the game. Multiverse Rumble 2 is what one would say, an add on to Multiverse Rumble. It's Multiverse Rumble without online multiplayer. Instead, it's just in the MUGEN Engine, not the Ikemen GO engine.
  • 15 stages to play on
  • 38 fighters to fight with.
